name: Fishin'
description:
Hi, this game was made over 1.5/2 days, so it may be a bit simple and rough around the edges but I think it's still pretty fun. The green bar at the bottom of the screen indicates how close you are to loosing the fish. If the bar hits either side of the screen you loose the fish. Some fish are stronger than others so make sure you are ready to strike!

controls:

  • throw line or reel in fish: spacebar
  • cancel fishing before a fish is on the line: e
  • move: wasd
  • look: mouse
  • quit game: alt+F4

Have a look around the island to see the different areas.

check the read me file included in the download to record the fish you catch, have fun!
